title: Sudden speaker distortion on Pixel 3XL
content:
Very suddenly there is distortion and buzz at all volume levels regardless of what media I play.
This used to only occur at the max three volume levels, now it is constant. 

This did not happen after a system restart or any damage to the phone, simply when I woke up and started using it. 
Tried rebooting normally and in safe mode, leaving phone off for a while. Nothing has fixed it.
